user.description:
To connect to a PurpleAir station, find the station you want to configure on the PurpleAir map, select it, and in the popup, right click on "Get This Widget" and copy the station data link.

A device will be created with basic data and will be populated on the next data pull.
user.title: Connect to a PurpleAir Station
